attributes.action: Remove covid 19 rules it should be down to the public enoughs enough.
attributes.additional_details: Remove the restrictions. U turns are not acceptable. Business and people are suffering but the government doesnt have the resources to handle it.
attributes.background: Allow the general population to make their mind up on the risks. There's so many people and businesses affected by this. If the general public know the risk then they are educated enough. I've missed out on some many things with the kids its not making any difference.

rejection.details: Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469
